name: Gabriel Ogard
title: Software Developer
summary: Builder. Software Developer. Originally from Norway, based in Vienna, Austria. Currently working as a Software Engineer for Paysafe. I work across the stack, but I tend to prefer working on the back-end.

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: As a key member of the development team at Paysafe, I contributed to several high-impact initiatives. I played an integral role in developing and integrating a custom marketing automation platform that created significant efficiency gains and cost savings for the marketing department. Additionally, I collaborated on enhancing the paysafecard distributor management system and the company's gift card shop, helping to optimize operational workflows, improve user engagement, and boost sales performance.

experience.title: Software Engineer (Internship)
experience.description: Crafted and implemented a user-friendly customer portal for Milient's project management SaaS product, as a key project during my software engineering internship, while concurrently conducting research and analysis for my bachelor's thesis focusing on the portal's features and impact.

education.description: Studied a diverse range of software development areas, including frontend, backend, and embedded systems, as part of the Information Technology program. Acquired a solid foundation in coding languages and technologies.

projects.title: Portfolio Website (This one right here)
projects.description: A personal site built with Next.js and Tailwind.

projects.title: Paysafe Gift Card Shop
projects.description: One of the projects I've worked on professionally. Gift cards for various merchants.
